page.title: 08HOLCOMBE COURT
page.content: Holcombe Court is a most interesting old Elizabethan house which is in Holcombe Rogus at the other end of the main street from our school. For many centuries it was owned by the Bluett family.They sold it to the Fleetwood-Hesketh's who stayed here for most of this century.It was then sold to Colonel and Mrs.P.Dobree,who have been here for about 5 years.They have made it very nice indeed.It is not open to the public but they invited the children from our school to come.We made a Video there set in Elizabethan times.Every child in the school was in the film.It won us a prize in the Devon Schools Video competition.
